named-native-query.name: Schedule.findByGroupId
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM schedule s inner join group_schedule gs on s.id = gs.schedule_id WHERE gs.group_id = :groupId

named-native-query.name: Schedule.countByGroupId
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule s inner join group_schedule gs on s.id = gs.schedule_id WHERE gs.group_id = :groupId
